results.title: Reduction of proteinuria by angiotensin converting enzyme inhibition.
results.text_hl: During the first eight weeks of treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, there was a comparable degree of blood @DISEASE_Pressure_Ulcer @DISEASE_MESH:D003668 @@@pressure@@@ reduction with both treatment regimens, whereas @<m>DISEASE_Urinary_Fistula</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014548 @@@urinary protein loss@@@ was significantly less during @GENE_ACE @GENE_1636 @@@ACE@@@ inhibition.

citations.NLM: Heeg JE, de Jong PE, van der Hem GK, de Zeeuw D. Reduction of proteinuria by angiotensin converting enzyme inhibition. Kidney Int. 1987 Jul;32(1):78-83. PMID: 3041097
citations.BibTeX: @article{3041097, title={Reduction of proteinuria by angiotensin converting enzyme inhibition.}, author={Heeg JE and de Jong PE and van der Hem GK and de Zeeuw D}, journal={Kidney Int}, volume={32}, number={1}, pages={78-83}}
